title: Introduction to React Hooks
notes: Learn the fundamentals of React Hooks including useState and useEffect. This video covers practical examples and best practices for modern React development.

title: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
notes: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript concepts including closures, prototypes, and async/await patterns. Essential knowledge for modern web development.

title: CSS Grid Layout Masterclass
notes: Master CSS Grid layout with practical examples. Learn how to create complex, responsive layouts with ease using CSS Grid properties.
